name: Alex Basics Danganropa edition
description:
Oh noes! OH NOES! OH NOOOOOOOOOOEEEEEEEEEEES!

School's out, but your friends all have a few issues! Your friend forgot his biology books! Alex's gone missing! IT'S CHAOS ALL AROUND!

The main question is, why now of all times would Alex disappear?
That's the question you're about to find out! As well as It's A Candy Princess...

But be careful...
Your fate will be sealed as soon as you cross over the threshold...
